/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their white and red facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. On the left side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The overall scene is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance.
